text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Donald Trump used the Defense Production Act to force people to work in meat plants that are being overwhelmed by the Coronavirus.

Why? Because the wealthy owners of these meat plants give to Donald Trump’s campaign. The wealthy owners like the Tyson don’t want to lose $$$$
